name: Intruders (ZX Spectrum) by Sam Pedigo
description:
1 PRINT "YOU ARE IN A BASEMENT AND MUST FIND YOUR WAY OUT": PAPER 5: INK 2: BRIGHT 1: INPUT A$: IF A$="FIND A LIGHT SOURCE" THEN PRINT "YOU FIND A FLASHLIGHT": INPUT A$: IF A$="LOOK" THEN PRINT "YOU LOOK AROUND, IT IS BRIGHT NOW. YOU CAN SEE A KEY HERE.": INPUT A$: IF A$="TAKE KEY" THEN PRINT "YOU TAKE THE KEY": PAPER 1: PRINT INK 2;"THERE ARE MEN IN THE HOUSE;\o\..\o..YOU MUST FIND A WAY OUT"
2 INPUT A$: IF A$="OPEN WINDOW" THEN PRINT "YOU OPEN THE WINDOW AND LEAVE TO GET THE COPS. CONGRATULATIONS, YOU WO-,NO YOU GOT SHOT..": PRINT INK 4;"GAME OVER"
3 IF A$="FIND A WEAPON" THEN PRINT "YOU FIND A KNIFE, IT IS RAZOR SHARP": INPUT A$: IF A$="KILL " THEN PRINT PAPER 2: PRINT INK 3;"THE KNIFE IS NOW COVERED IN BLOOD FROM THE BODY. YOU HIDE IT."
4 PRINT "YOU LOOM OVER THE LAST TARGET, YOUR EYES WILD..."
5 BEEP 3,6: BEEP 3,1: BEEP 2,1
6 PRINT "YOU PLUNGE THE KNIFE INTO THE TRESPASSER AND LEAVE OUT THE FRONT DOOR"
7 REM NO HAPPY ENDINGS
8 PAPER 1: BEEP 3,6: BEEP 1,3: BEEP 1,0: BEEP 2,6
9 PRINT "YOU HAVE BEEN ARRESTED"
10 PRINT INK 4;"CONGRATS ON WINNING THE GAME."
